pkgmetadata.longdescription: General Purpose Interface to Elasticsearch // Connect to Elasticsearch, a NoSQL database built on the Java Virtual Machine. Interacts with the Elasticsearch HTTP API (http://elasticsearch.org), including functions for setting connection details to Elasticsearch instances, loading bulk data, searching for documents with both HTTP query variables and JSON based body requests. In addition, elastic provides functions for interacting with APIs for indices, documents, nodes, clusters, an interface to the cat API, and more.
